select.if:
select count(distinct cc.id) FROM cms_content cc LEFT JOIN cms_category ccg ON cc.category_id = ccg.id LEFT JOIN material m ON m.id = cc.material_id left join material_org mo on mo.material_id=m.id left join writer_user wu on wu.org_id=mo.org_id WHERE cc.is_deleted = 0 AND cc.category_id=3 AND cc.auth_status =2 AND cc.is_published =1 and ( ( (
( wu.id=#{userid} and m.is_public=0 ) or
m.is_public=1 ) and cc.is_material_entry =1 and m.is_deleted=0 ) or cc.is_material_entry = 0 )

select count(b.id) from cms_content b left join material m on b.material_id=m.id left join material_extra me on me.material_id=m.id where b.is_deleted=0 and b.is_hide=0 and b.material_id=#{materialId} and b.is_published=1 and b.auth_status=2 and b.category_id=3

select tt.* from ( select b.* , (select count(d.id) from declaration d where d.material_id=b.material_id and d.online_progress >0) as jcount, (TO_DAYS(NOW()) <= TO_DAYS(b.actual_deadline ) and !b.is_force_end and !b.is_all_textbook_published)*b.is_material_entry as sortByEntryBtnOn, (TO_DAYS(NOW()) <= TO_DAYS(b.actual_deadline ) and !b.is_force_end and !b.is_all_textbook_published) as notEnd, d.id as declarationId, (case when d.online_progress REGEXP '^[520]{1}$' then 1 else 0 end )as decEditable
from (select t.*,b.deadline,me.notice,b.actual_deadline,b.is_force_end,b.is_all_textbook_published from cms_content t left join material b on t.material_id =b.id left join material_extra me on me.material_id=b.id where t.category_id=3 and t.is_published=1 and t.auth_status=2 and t.is_deleted=0 and ( (b.is_public =1 and t.is_material_entry=1 and b.is_deleted=0) or t.is_material_entry=0 ) union select t.*,b.deadline,me.notice,b.actual_deadline,b.is_force_end,b.is_all_textbook_published from cms_content t left join material b on t.material_id =b.id left join material_org u on b.id=u.material_id left join (select tu.*,wuc.progress from writer_user tu LEFT JOIN writer_user_certification wuc on tu.id = wuc.user_id where tu.id = #{userid}) p on p.org_id=u.org_id left join material_extra me on me.material_id=b.id where t.category_id=3 and t.is_published=1 and b.is_public =0 and p.progress =3 and b.is_deleted=0 and t.auth_status=2 and t.is_material_entry=1 and t.is_deleted=0 and p.id= #{userid} ) b left join declaration d on d.user_id = #{userid} and d.material_id=b.material_id
)tt ORDER BY
tt.sortByEntryBtnOn desc ,tt.declarationId asc,tt.auth_date DESC , tt.actual_deadline DESC ,tt.deadline desc
tt.auth_date DESC
tt.jcount DESC
LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}

select b.*,m.deadline,m.actual_deadline,me.notice from cms_content b left join material m on b.material_id=m.id left join material_extra me on me.material_id=m.id where b.is_deleted=0 and b.is_hide=0 and b.material_id=#{materialId} and b.is_published=1 and b.auth_status=2 and b.category_id=3 ORDER BY
b.is_promote desc,b.sort_promote, b.is_hot DESC,b.sort_hot, b.auth_date DESC
b.auth_date DESC
b.is_hot DESC,b.sort_hot
LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
